description: The Department of National Defence (DND) require the services of two (2) Business Consultants, Intermediate Level, to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), 1 Canadian Air Division (1 CAD), in the advancement of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) long-term operational and institutional planning, goal analysis, and resource synchronization.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
